execution_messages: Reservation not found or user ID does not match.

user_id.description: The ID of the user making the modification.

reservation_id.description: The reservation ID of the booking to be modified.

new_flight_no.description: The new flight number to change to (optional).

new_cabin.description: The new cabin class to change to (optional).

add_baggage.description: The number of additional checked baggage items to add (default is 0).

new_payment_method.description: Optional payment method for any additional charges (either 'cash' or 'bank'). If not provided, the original payment method will be used.
